weekly picks (Sep 3 week 2022)

Posted on September 12, 2022 in 2022sep 

A WordCloud of 2022 Sep 3rd week collection

  1. 2209.04472 Vortex Fermi Liquid and Strongly Correlated Bad Metal (CenkeXu, arXiv)

  2. 2209.04485 Chiral spin liquids on the kagome lattice with projected entangled simplex states (arXiv)

  3. 2209.04498 Magnetic impurities in a charge-ordered background (arXiv)

  4. 2209.04527 Control of magnetic states and spin interactions in bilayer CrCl$_{3}$ with strain and electric fields (arXiv)

  5. 2209.04560 Thermal cycling induced alteration of the stacking order and spin-flip in the room temperature van der Waals magnet Fe$_5$GeTe$_2$ (arXiv)

  6. 2209.04563 Strong-Weak Duality via Jordan-Wigner Transformation: Using Fermionic Methods for Strongly Correlated $su(2)$ Spin Systems (arXiv)

  7. 2209.04590 Magnetic field effects in an octupolar quantum spin liquid candidate (arXiv)

  8. 2209.04592 Discovery of a pair density wave state in a monolayer high-Tc iron-based superconductor (arXiv)

  9. 2209.04730 Antiferromagnetic Chern insulator in centrosymmetric systems (arXiv)

  10. 2209.04912 LaVO$_3$: a true Kugel-Khomskii system (arXiv)

  11. 2209.04949 Orbital correlations in ultrathin films of late transition metals (arXiv)

  12. 2209.04993 Spin-selective tunneling from nanowires of the candidate topological Kondo insulator SmB6 (arXiv)

  13. 2209.05192 Pair binding and enhancement of pairing correlations in asymmetric Hubbard ladders (arXiv)

  14. 2209.05353 Pressure-induced transitions in FePS$_3$: Structural, magnetic and electronic properties (arXiv)

  15. 2209.05398 High-temperature kinetic magnetism in triangular lattices (arXiv)

  16. 2209.05430 Pseudogap metal and magnetization plateau from doping moire Mott insulator (LiangFu, arXiv)

  17. PhysRevB.106.094414 Inverse Faraday effect in massive Dirac electrons (Tatara, PRB)

  18. PhysRevB.106.104409 Indirect exchange interaction in two-dimensional materials with quartic dispersion (PRB)

  19. PhysRevB.106.104507 Hall anomaly by vacancies in a pinned lattice of vortices: A quantitative analysis based on the thin-film data from ${\mathrm{Bi}}{2.1}{\mathrm{Sr}}{1.9}{\mathrm{CaCu}}{2.0}{\mathrm{O}}{8+\ensuremath{\delta}}$ (PRB)

  20. PhysRevB.106.115118 Anomalous Nernst effect in the nonmagnetic nodal-line semimetal ${\mathrm{PbTaSe}}_{2}$ (PRB)

  21. PhysRevB.106.115120 Charge singlets and orbital-selective charge density wave transitions (PRB)

  22. PhysRevB.106.115409 Topological quantum phase transitions in metallic Shiba lattices (YongXu, PRB)

  23. PhysRevB.106.115411 Coupled superconducting spin qubits with spin-orbit interaction (PRB)

  24. PhysRevB.106.125114 Dissipation and geometry in nonlinear quantum transports of multiband electronic systems (Nagaosa, PRB)

  25. PhysRevB.106.125117 Role of symmetry breaking in high-order harmonic generation from Su-Schrieffer-Heeger systems (PRB)

  26. PhysRevB.106.125302 Quantitative determination of interlayer electronic coupling at various critical points in bilayer $\mathrm{Mo}{\mathrm{S}}_{2}$ (PRB)

  27. PhysRevB.106.L121104 Temperature-dependent band modification and energy dependence of the electron-phonon interaction in the topological surface state on ${\mathrm{Bi}}{2}{\mathrm{Te}}{3}$ (PRB)

  28. PhysRevB.106.L121105 Fractional vortices, ${\mathbb{Z}}_{2}$ gauge theory, and the confinement-deconfinement transition (DHLee, PRB)

  29. PhysRevB.106.L121401 Edge states of topological acoustic phonons in graphene zigzag nanoribbons (PRB)

  30. 2209.04004 Disorder Induced Anomalous Thermal Hall Effect in Chiral Phases of Superfluid $^3$He (arXiv.org)

  31. 2209.03444 ScGAN: A Generative Adversarial Network to Predict Hypothetical Superconductors (arXiv.org)

  32. 2209.03515 Superconducting diode effect and nonreciprocal transition lines (arXiv.org)

  33. 2209.03840 Titanium-based kagome superconductor CsTi_3Bi_5 and topological states (arXiv.org)

  34. 2209.03896 Heat capacity double transitions in time-reversal symmetry broken superconductors (arXiv.org)

  35. 2209.04015 ipie: A Python-based Auxiliary-Field Quantum Monte Carlo Program with Flexibility and Efficiency on CPUs and GPUs (arXiv.org)

  36. 2209.04102 Steady helix states in a resonant XXZ Heisenberg model with Dzyaloshinskii-Moriya interaction (arXiv.org)

  37. 2209.04133 Thermal Hall conductivity with sign change in the Heisenberg-Kitaev kagome magnet (arXiv.org)

  38. 2209.04226 Charge density wave-generated Fermi surfaces in NdTe$_3$ (arXiv.org)

  39. 2209.03555 Dominance of Electron-Magnon Scattering in Itinerant Ferromagnet Fe3GeTe2 (arXiv.org)

  40. 2209.03628 Transport anisotropy and metal-insulator transition in striped Dirac fermion systems (arXiv.org)

  41. 2209.03672 Observation of strange metal in hole-doped valley-spin insulator (arXiv.org)

  42. 2209.03743 Exact analysis of the Liouvillian gap and dynamics in the dissipative SU($N$) Fermi-Hubbard model (arXiv.org)

  43. PhysRevLett.129.116804 Moire Landau Fans and Magic Zeros (LiangFu, PRL)

  44. PhysRevLett.129.110601 Energetics of a Single Qubit Gate (PRL)

  45. PhysRevLett.129.116805 Anomalous Zero-Field Splitting for Hole Spin Qubits in Si and Ge Quantum Dots (PRL)

  46. PhysRevLett.129.117202 Observation of Vector Spin Seebeck Effect in a Noncollinear Antiferromagnet (PRL)

  47. PhysRevLett.129.117602 Spectroscopy of Twisted Bilayer Graphene Correlated Insulators (PRL)

  48. PhysRevB.106.104505 Incoherent tunneling and topological superconductivity in twisted cuprate bilayers (PRB)

  49. PhysRevB.106.104506 Pairing symmetry of twisted bilayer graphene: A phenomenological synthesis (PRB)

  50. PhysRevB.106.125410 Softened $s{p}^{2}\text{\ensuremath{-}}s{p}^{3}$ bonding network leads to strong anharmonicity and weak hydrodynamics in graphene+ (PRB)

  51. PhysRevB.106.L100402 Spin- and flux-gap renormalization in the random Kitaev spin ladder (PRB)

  52. PhysRevB.106.L100501 Superconductivity in multiorbital systems with repulsive interactions: Hund’s pairing versus spin-fluctuation pairing (PRB)

  53. PhysRevB.106.094504 Quality factor for zero-bias conductance peaks in Majorana nanowire (PRB)

  54. PhysRevB.106.104104 Raman mode softening in ${\mathrm{SrMnO}}_{3}$ induced by optical excitation (PRB)

  55. PhysRevB.106.115113 Disorder-enhanced effective masses and deviations from Matthiessen’s rule in ${\text{PdCoO}}_{2}$ thin films (PRB)

  56. PhysRevB.106.125110 Direct observation of multiband charge density waves in ${\mathrm{NbTe}}_{2}$ (PRB)

  57. PhysRevB.106.L100502 Phase-tunable electron transport assisted by odd-frequency Cooper pairs in topological Josephson junctions (PRB)

  58. PhysRevB.106.104503 Prevalence of trivial zero-energy subgap states in nonuniform helical spin chains on the surface of superconductors (PRB)

  59. PhysRevB.106.115112 Rare-earth monopnictides: Family of antiferromagnets hosting magnetic Fermi arcs (PRB)

  60. PhysRevB.106.094411 Atomic-scale spin-wave polarizer based on a sharp antiferromagnetic domain wall (PRB)

  61. PhysRevB.106.094501 Inverse proximity effect in a topological-insulator–superconductor hybrid system (PRB)

  62. PhysRevB.106.115109 Higher-dimensional Jordan-Wigner transformation and auxiliary Majorana fermions (PRB)

  63. PhysRevB.106.115110 ${\mathrm{LaVO}}_{3}$: A true Kugel-Khomskii system (PRB)

  64. PhysRevB.106.L100401 Pinch points and half-moons in dipolar-octupolar ${\mathrm{Nd}}{2}{\mathrm{Hf}}{2}{\mathrm{O}}_{7}$ (PRB)

  65. 2209.04335 S. Vonsovsky and the dawn of the theory of strongly correlated systems (Journal of Superconductivity and Novel Magnetism)

  66. 2209.04336 Topological states in strongly correlated systems (Journal of Superconductivity and Novel Magnetism)
